name: FetchPaymentList
description:
Retrieve a list of payments for an account.

This tool calls the Squareup API to fetch a list of payments associated with the account making the request. It should be called when you need to access recent payment records. Note that results are eventually consistent, and there may be slight delays in updates.

parameters.name: start_time_for_payment_retrieval
parameters.description: The start time for retrieving payments, in RFC 3339 format, using the `created_at` field. Default is current time minus one year.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the start of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.
The range is determined using the `created_at` field for each Payment.
Inclusive. Default: The current time minus one year.

parameters.name: payment_retrieval_end_time
parameters.description: The end of the time range to retrieve payments, in RFC 3339 format. Defaults to the current time.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the end of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `created_at` field for each Payment.

Default: The current time.

parameters.name: order_results_by
parameters.description: Specify the order of payment results: 'ASC' for oldest to newest, 'DESC' for newest to oldest (default).

value_schema.description:
The order in which results are listed by `ListPaymentsRequest.sort_field`:
- `ASC` - Oldest to newest.
- `DESC` - Newest to oldest (default).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor from a previous call for fetching the next set of payment results. Use it for pagination.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: limit_results_by_location
parameters.description: Specify the location ID to limit payment results to that location. Defaults to the main seller location if not provided.

value_schema.description:
Limit results to the location supplied. By default, results are returned
for the default (main) location associated with the seller.

parameters.name: exact_payment_amount
parameters.description: The exact amount of the payment in the total_money field. Provide as an integer value.

value_schema.description: The exact amount in the `total_money` for a payment.

parameters.name: payment_card_last_four_digits
parameters.description: The last four digits of a payment card to filter specific payments.

value_schema.description: The last four digits of a payment card.

parameters.name: payment_card_brand
parameters.description: The brand of the payment card to filter payments by (e.g., VISA, MasterCard).

value_schema.description: The brand of the payment card (for example, VISA).

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of payment records to return per page, up to 100. Values over 100 are ignored.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to be returned in a single page.
It is possible to receive fewer results than the specified limit on a given page.

The default value of 100 is also the maximum allowed value. If the provided value is 
greater than 100, it is ignored and the default value is used instead.

Default: `100`

parameters.name: offline_payment_start_time
parameters.description: Indicate the start of the time range for retrieving offline payments in RFC 3339 format. Defaults to the current time.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the start of the time range for which to retrieve offline payments, in RFC 3339
format for timestamps. The range is determined using the
`offline_payment_details.client_created_at` field for each Payment. If set, payments without a
value set in `offline_payment_details.client_created_at` will not be returned.

Default: The current time.

parameters.name: offline_payment_end_time
parameters.description: End time in RFC 3339 format to retrieve offline payments, based on `client_created_at`. Defaults to current time.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the end of the time range for which to retrieve offline payments, in RFC 3339
format for timestamps. The range is determined using the
`offline_payment_details.client_created_at` field for each Payment. If set, payments without a
value set in `offline_payment_details.client_created_at` will not be returned.

Default: The current time.

parameters.name: updated_at_start_time
parameters.description: Start time in RFC 3339 format to retrieve payments using the `updated_at` field.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the start of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `updated_at` field for each Payment.

parameters.name: end_time_for_update_retrieval
parameters.description: The end time in RFC 3339 format to filter payments by the `updated_at` field.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the end of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `updated_at` field for each Payment.

parameters.name: sort_results_by_field
parameters.description: Specify the field to sort the payment results by. Options are 'CREATED_AT', 'OFFLINE_CREATED_AT', or 'UPDATED_AT'. Default is 'CREATED_AT'.

value_schema.description: The field used to sort results by. The default is `CREATED_AT`.

parameters.name: include_offline_payments
parameters.description: Set to true to include payments taken offline. False excludes them.

value_schema.description: Whether the payment was taken offline or not.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: begin_time
parameters.description:
Indicates the start of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.
The range is determined using the `created_at` field for each Payment.
Inclusive. Default: The current time minus one year.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the start of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.
The range is determined using the `created_at` field for each Payment.
Inclusive. Default: The current time minus one year.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description:
Indicates the end of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `created_at` field for each Payment.

Default: The current time.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the end of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `created_at` field for each Payment.

Default: The current time.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description:
The order in which results are listed by `ListPaymentsRequest.sort_field`:
- `ASC` - Oldest to newest.
- `DESC` - Newest to oldest (default).

value_schema.description:
The order in which results are listed by `ListPaymentsRequest.sort_field`:
- `ASC` - Oldest to newest.
- `DESC` - Newest to oldest (default).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for the original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description:
Limit results to the location supplied. By default, results are returned
for the default (main) location associated with the seller.

value_schema.description:
Limit results to the location supplied. By default, results are returned
for the default (main) location associated with the seller.

parameters.name: total
parameters.description: The exact amount in the `total_money` for a payment.

value_schema.description: The exact amount in the `total_money` for a payment.

parameters.name: last_4
parameters.description: The last four digits of a payment card.

value_schema.description: The last four digits of a payment card.

parameters.name: card_brand
parameters.description: The brand of the payment card (for example, VISA).

value_schema.description: The brand of the payment card (for example, VISA).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of results to be returned in a single page.
It is possible to receive fewer results than the specified limit on a given page.

The default value of 100 is also the maximum allowed value. If the provided value is 
greater than 100, it is ignored and the default value is used instead.

Default: `100`

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to be returned in a single page.
It is possible to receive fewer results than the specified limit on a given page.

The default value of 100 is also the maximum allowed value. If the provided value is 
greater than 100, it is ignored and the default value is used instead.

Default: `100`

parameters.name: is_offline_payment
parameters.description: Whether the payment was taken offline or not.

value_schema.description: Whether the payment was taken offline or not.

parameters.name: offline_begin_time
parameters.description:
Indicates the start of the time range for which to retrieve offline payments, in RFC 3339
format for timestamps. The range is determined using the
`offline_payment_details.client_created_at` field for each Payment. If set, payments without a
value set in `offline_payment_details.client_created_at` will not be returned.

Default: The current time.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the start of the time range for which to retrieve offline payments, in RFC 3339
format for timestamps. The range is determined using the
`offline_payment_details.client_created_at` field for each Payment. If set, payments without a
value set in `offline_payment_details.client_created_at` will not be returned.

Default: The current time.

parameters.name: offline_end_time
parameters.description:
Indicates the end of the time range for which to retrieve offline payments, in RFC 3339
format for timestamps. The range is determined using the
`offline_payment_details.client_created_at` field for each Payment. If set, payments without a
value set in `offline_payment_details.client_created_at` will not be returned.

Default: The current time.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the end of the time range for which to retrieve offline payments, in RFC 3339
format for timestamps. The range is determined using the
`offline_payment_details.client_created_at` field for each Payment. If set, payments without a
value set in `offline_payment_details.client_created_at` will not be returned.

Default: The current time.

parameters.name: updated_at_begin_time
parameters.description:
Indicates the start of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `updated_at` field for each Payment.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the start of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `updated_at` field for each Payment.

parameters.name: updated_at_end_time
parameters.description:
Indicates the end of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `updated_at` field for each Payment.

value_schema.description:
Indicates the end of the time range to retrieve payments for, in RFC 3339 format.  The
range is determined using the `updated_at` field for each Payment.

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: The field used to sort results by. The default is `CREATED_AT`.

value_schema.description: The field used to sort results by. The default is `CREATED_AT`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
